---
name: Feature proposal
about: Propose a net-new capability for PRDT (CLI flag, report, automation, etc.).
title: "[FEAT] "
labels: ["enhancement"]
assignees: []
---

## Problem / opportunity
What research workflow, collaborator, or reviewer pain are we solving? Provide real-world context (e.g., IRB export, admissions demo).

## Proposed solution
Describe the change at a high level. Screenshots, mock CLI usage, or API sketches help reviewers understand scope quickly.

## Definition of done
- [ ] User story and acceptance criteria captured
- [ ] Telemetry / outputs documented (README or `docs/`)
- [ ] Tests updated or added

## Dependencies / blockers
List related issues, external datasets, or design decisions that must land first.

## Additional notes
Link to meeting notes, Looms, or supporting research that inspired the proposal.
